<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 478, 465, 492]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 494, 599, 509]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 510, 380, 525]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 577, 370, 591]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 593, 904, 622]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 624, 456, 638]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 657, 606, 672]]<|/det|>
